Component.Name: Explorer
Component.description: This is a Windows app that provides a thick-client UI to manage Corkscrew structures. This is has more features than the centrally-hosted Control Center and exposes ability to perform almost every possible action on the Farm and its objects. It uses .NET Framework 4.6 technology. The app will require connectivity to your Corkscrew_ConfigDB database to function.
